Address.value: ONE MICHAEL OWENS WAY, PERRYSBURG, Ohio, 43551, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: O-I Glass Inc is a manufacturer of glass containers. O-I has a presence in three markets namely Americas Europe and Asia Pacific. Beer is the primary end market for O-Is glass bottles. Its glass containers are also used for other products such as wine soda spirits condiments and food.
